MemberSignature.Value: public AssemblyIdentity (string name, string version, string publicKeyToken, string culture);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, string version, string publicKeyToken, string culture) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, version As String, publicKeyToken As String, culture As String)
public: AssemblyIdentity(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ version, System::String ^ publicKeyToken, System::String ^ culture);

span.span: Specifies the simple name of the assembly.
Specifies the version of the assembly.

param.name: publicKeyToken
param.span: 어셈블리의 공개 키 토큰을 지정합니다. 공개 키 토큰은 어셈블리가 서명되는 공개 키의 SHA-1 해시의 마지막 8바이트입니다.

span.span: Specifies the public key token of the assembly, which is the last 8 bytes of the SHA-1 hash of the public key under which the assembly is signed.
Specifies the culture of the assembly.
A blank string indicates the invariant culture.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity FromAssemblyName(string assemblyName) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromAssemblyName (assemblyName As String) As AssemblyIdentity

param.name: assemblyName
param.span: 표시 이름이라고도 하는 어셈블리의 전체 이름입니다.

span.span: The full name of the assembly, also known as the display name.

summary.span: 어셈블리 ID를 가져올 문자열을 구문 분석합니다.

span.span: Parses string to obtain an assembly identity.

summary.span: ID를 가져올 수 없는 경우 null을 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The resulting assembly identity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity FromFile(string path) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromFile (path As String) As AssemblyIdentity

span.span: The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
Obtains identity of the specified assembly.

summary.span: 파일은 포함된 xml 매니페스트, 독립 실행형 xml 매니페스트 파일 또는 .NET 어셈블리를 가진 PE일 수 있습니다.

span.span: File can be a PE with an embedded xml manifest, a stand-alone xml manifest file, or a .NET assembly.

summary.span: ID를 가져올 수 없는 경우 null을 반환합니다.

span.span: Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
The assembly identity of the specified file.
